intrebare?: A kindergarten child's finger painting cannot be copyrighted because:
raspuns1: It is not true; a kindergarten child's finger painting can be copyrighted.
raspuns2: A child in kindergarten is just a little kid.
raspuns4: A child in kindergarten does not care whether his work is copyrighted.
raspuns corect: It is not true; a kindergarten child's finger painting can be copyrighted.

intrebare?: Which of the following is illegal?
raspuns1: Copying a music CD to store in your own car
raspuns2: Copying a music CD to your MP3 player
raspuns3: Copying a music CD to give to a friend
raspuns corect: Copying a music CD to give to a friend

intrebare?: Which of the following statements are correct? One purpose of copyright is to:
raspuns1: Enable copyright owners to stop all unauthorized uses of their works.
raspuns2: Promote the progress of the arts, culture, and literature.
raspuns3: Enable copyright owners to silence their critics.
raspuns4: Benefit large corporations and does not consider the interests of individual creators.
raspuns corect: Promote the progress of the arts, culture, and literature.
